attributes.action: Proposal to remove from Office The Prime Minister Keir Starmer.
attributes.background: Proposal to remove from Office Prime Minister Keir Starmer who’s policies are and have seriously undermined the successful administration of this country.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes requests for individuals to be appointed to or removed from office. 

You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a general election: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700143
